Address.value: 1090 WEST GEORGIA STREET,SUITE 700,SUITE 700, VANCOUVER, British Columbia, V6E 3V7, Canada

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Vizsla Silver Corp is a junior mineral exploration and development company focused on advancing its Panuco silver-gold project located in Sinaloa, Mexico. The property contains quartz-carbonate veins with workings defining both steeply plunging and sub-horizontal ore shoots. Mineralization occurs as silver sulphides including argentite and acanthite, native gold, electrum and native silver associated with pyrite, minor galena, sphalerite and rare chalcopyrite.
